welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Guadalupe, Costa Rica! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city known for its stunning beaches, lush rainforests, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Guadalupe has to offer."

restaurants.name: Xico's Café
restaurants.description: Xico's Café is a café located in São Tomé.
restaurants.address: Praça da Amizade Entre os Povos, 392, São Tomé

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves flights within Costa Rica and to nearby countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
